entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
